Question: Miners had helped bring down the Heath government, and this person was determined to succeed where he had failed.
Hints: This person was one of the first Western leaders to respond warmly to reformist Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev.
During her premiership this person had the second-lowest average approval rating, at 40 percent, of any post-war Prime Minister.
This person wanted to prevent the creation of a Scottish assembly.
